sentences.english: Part IV is to discuss how to strengthenpsychology health education to suit teachers school graduates needs in ChongqingMunicipality.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分是加强重庆市中师生心理健康教育。

sentences.english: During the teaching force of the subtleties will be passed to students, respected by the disciples.
sentences.chinese: 教学期间将武之奥妙之处传给师生，受到弟子尊敬。

sentences.english: The four-day-and-three-night trip stimulates the friendship and emotion among all.
sentences.chinese: 四天三夜的旅行促进了学生间的友谊和师生间的感情。

sentences.english: Chu Kan 8, each student of each department are subject to wide acclaim.
sentences.chinese: 出刊八期，每一期都受到各系师生的广泛好评。

sentences.english: Encourage teachers and students" participation and stimulate the establishment of campus culture by excellent school spirit."
sentences.chinese: 鼓励师生参与，以优良校风来促进校园文化建设。

sentences.english: In liberal education punishment no longer exists. Teachers and students are just like friends.
sentences.chinese: 开明教育也将惩戒体罚拒之门外，倡导师生如友。

sentences.english: The network teaching means that the teachers and the students rely on the media to carry out the non face-to-face education.
sentences.chinese: 网络教学是指师生凭借媒体所进行的非面对面的教育。

sentences.english: As the foremost leader of school, a principal takes the lead of the entire faculty as well as students to stride into the world.
sentences.chinese: 校长为学校的总顿导者，引顿著全校师生向国际迈进。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a teaching aid for communication between teacher and students: hand-up device.
sentences.chinese: 课堂举手器，它涉及一种课堂师生交流的教学器具。

sentences.english: Shaping a new teacher-student relationship is the core content advocated by a cooperative educational philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 塑造新型师生关系是合作教育理念倡导的核心内容。

sentences.english: All teachers and students gathered together and enjoyed this exquisite music.
sentences.chinese: 全体师生欢聚一堂，共同欣赏这别致的乐章。

sentences.english: Tunghai life bustled around the student center to this day.
sentences.chinese: 目前这里仍是一个全校师生生活与活动中心。

sentences.english: Then began a teacher –pupil relationship and a friendship which lasted for nearly 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 然后开始一段师生情，一段长达50年之久的友谊。

sentences.english: Reading room for teachers and students.
sentences.chinese: “乳源教师进修学校”师生阅览室。

sentences.english: A A good student-teacher relationship should not depend on the level of social contact.
sentences.chinese: 师生关系不应该依赖于课下接触。

sentences.english: Attitudes to student-teacher relationships have hardened over the past 15 years.
sentences.chinese: 15年来，人们对于师生关系的态度越来越强硬。
